ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: The last and the first belong to Allah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: To God belong the End and the Beginning.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: To Allah belong both the Next World and the present.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: All that is in the life to come and all that is in this life belongs only to God.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: So (know that) Allah only is the Owner of all – the Hereafter and this world.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: But to Allah belongs the last (Hereafter) and the first (the world).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Nay! for Allah is the hereafter and the former (life).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And to God belongs the First and the Last.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: But unto Allah belongeth the after (life), and the former.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: But it is to God that the Hereafter and this world belong.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Allah's is the last and the first.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Yet to Allah belong this world and the Hereafter.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: But it is to Allah that the End and the Beginning (of all things) belong.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: But to Allah belongs the last (Hereafter) and the first (the world).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: To Allah belongs the Eternal life and the first life.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: To God belong the Last and the First.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Rather, to Allah belongs the Hereafter and the first [life].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [53:25] Yet to God belong the Hereafter and the former [life], that is to say, [the life of] the world, and so nothing comes to pass in them except what He, exalted, wills.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (But Unto Allah belongeth the after (life)) through the bestowal of reward, honour and intercession, (and the former) by giving knowledge and success.
